articles.author: Kathryn Diss
articles.title: Colin Powell's legacy was defined by his role in the Iraq War — a 'painful blot' on the record of America's most celebrated soldier - ABC News
articles.description: Colin Powell achieved many things in his life but ultimately his claims about Iraq's weapons of mass destruction will overshadow the rest of his legacy, writes Kathryn Diss.
articles.content:
A soldier turned statesman: General Colin Powell made history on many fronts.
He was the nation's first African American national security advisor, chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff and secretar… [+6962 chars]

articles.title: Colin Powell, general who became US secretary of state, dies with Covid-19 - BreakingNews.ie
articles.description: The family said the ‘great American’, who was 84, had been fully vaccinated.
articles.content:
Colin Powell, the former US joint chiefs chairman and secretary of state, has died from Covid-19 complications, his family said.
